titleInfo.title: Hynson, R.R.B. in Mammoth Spring, Arkansas, to Church, Robert Reed Sr.

subject.topic: Anti-democracy impulses: Slavery, free people of color, and Removal of Native Americans .

mods.note: In response to a request from R. R. Church, Sr., Mr. Hynson recounts the history of Church`s family as they were bought and sold as slaves - by the Hynson family. "Sometime between the years 1800 and 1810 there landed on Norfolk Va a ship load of African slaves to be sold."
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
